description.en:
Proof of work (PoW) to secure the peer-to-peer network and confirm transactions ofeTITANIUM, a cryptocurrency created specifically to facilitate interactionswith social media.

We start here with simple day-to-day usage options. 

eTITANIUM intervenes on the following points;
- Cooperation with business customers from the music and movie industry,artists and influencers
- as the official currency for products offered by cooperation partners with special offers
- as an easy and fast means of payment for bills e.g. electricity, gas, telephone withparticipating cooperation partners
